events.name: The Satanic Chef
events.description: Join Adam Dodge in the kitchen of VHQ for a cooking workshop and conversation. Keep your eyes out for Sous Chef Jack!

events.name: Salem Witch Wiles
events.description: Join Thomas O'Brien Vallor, The Estate's resident Salem Witch for a conversation about Hexennacht.

events.name: The Love Witch with TST Oregon
events.description: Join TST Oregon for a showing of Anna Biller's classic The Love Witch.

events.name: Bats in the Belfry!
events.description: Livestreaming your new best friends, bats from BatWorld. Donate at batworld.org

events.name: A Happy Hooven Home: Goats!
events.description: Livestream of goats. Sponsor one of these good kids at woodstocksanctuary.org

events.name: Whimsical Blasphemy
events.description: Join Mercy for music and videos all night, live from Salem.

events.name: Grey Faction Satanic Archives
events.description: TSTVHQ's Satanic Archive Library is open all night. Texts courtesy of Center for Inquiry and Grey Faction.
